feed.title: Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:40 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow or freezing rain. Low minus 21.
